findings.lower_thorax: Right lower lobe consolidation or atelectasis and small pleural effusion. Trace left pleural effusion present.
findings.postsurgical_changes: Recent open cholecystectomy with a small amount of fluid in the resection bed.
findings.liver: Homogeneous in signal characteristics with no significant lesions. Minimal periportal edema present.
findings.biliary: No intra- or extra-hepatic duct dilatation. Common bile duct within normal limits.
findings.pancreas: Normal bulk but mildly low T1 signal particularly in the tail. No focal lesion or ductal abnormality.
findings.spleen: Normal in size and signal characteristics.
findings.kidneys: 3.7 cm cyst in the mid right kidney.
findings.vasculature: Patent abdominal aorta and proximal mesenteric vessels.
findings.osseous_soft_tissue: L1 vertebral body T2 bright hemangioma.
